page.title: 11HARPUR HILL PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: We went to interview{Mr Mason,}the headteacher. He was very helpful and showed us the first {Log Book} of the school. It opened as {Grinlow School} in{1876}with a head and two teachers You can see the old school and school master's house opposite the Park Inn; today High Peak College use it. The Junior School moved to Trent Avenue in 1951 when the council estate was built and it was enlarged in{1975}to cope with the children from the new Foxlow estate. Today, there are{274 children and{10 teachers;}nine classes in Harpur Hill and one teacher and 11 children at Chelmorton School. A caretaker & two cleaners look after the school. When we visited the top two classes had just returned from a school journey to the {Isle of Wight.
